titleStmt.title: A strange banquet, or, The divels entertainment by Cook Laurell at the Peak in Devonshire, with a true relation of the several dishes. The tune is, Cook Laurell.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Cook Laurel would have the divel his guest ..."
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives a span of dates, 1647-1665.
Imprint and printer's name from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Imperfect: torn with partial loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
